params._dex: The address of the DEX contract to be approved.

params._dexs: The addresses of the DEX contracts to be approved.
The addresses of the DEX contracts to be unregistered.

params._approval: whether the function signatures should be allowed

params._dex: The address of the DEX contract to be unregistered.

params._approval: whether the function signature should be allowed

addDex(address).notice: Register the address of a DEX contract to be approved for swapping.

approvedDexs().notice: Returns a list of all approved DEX addresses.

batchAddDex(address[]).notice: Batch register the address of DEX contracts to be approved for swapping.

batchRemoveDex(address[]).notice: Batch unregister the addresses of DEX contracts approved for swapping.

batchSetFunctionApprovalBySignature(byte.notice: Batch Adds/removes a specific function signature to/from the allowlist

isFunctionApproved(bytes4).notice: Returns whether a function signature is approved

removeDex(address).notice: Unregister the address of a DEX contract approved for swapping.

setFunctionApprovalBySignature(bytes4,bo.notice: Adds/removes a specific function signature to/from the allowlist

userdoc.notice: Facet contract for managing approved DEXs to be used in swaps.
